package.name: fanuc_m20ib_moveit_plugins

description.p: MoveIt plugins for the Fanuc M-20iB (and variants).

This package contains plugins for use with MoveIt and Fanuc M-20iB manipulators. Plugins included support the base model. See the Fanuc M-20iB support package for information on used joint angle and velocity limits.
Before using any of the plugins included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Axel Schroth
Simon Schmeisser
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)

export.deprecated: All IKFast MoveIt plugins are deprecated and will be removed from future releases. Where possible, they will be replaced with OPW Kinematics-based plugins.
